verses.verse: Children, <WG5043> obey <WG5219> your <WG5216> parents <WG1118> in the Lord: <WG2962> for this <WG5124> is right. <WG1342>
Honor <WG5091> your father <WG3962> and mother; <WG3384> which <WG3748> is the first <WG4413> commandment <WG1785> with promise; <WG1860>
That it may be well <WG2095> with you, and you may live <WG2071> <WG3118> long <WG3118> on <WG1909> the earth. <WG1093>
And, you fathers, <WG3962> provoke <WG3949> not your <WG5216> children <WG5043> to wrath: <WG3949> but bring <WG1625> them up in the nurture <WG3809> and admonition <WG3559> of the Lord. <WG2962>

Servants, <WG1401> be obedient <WG5219> to them that are your masters <WG2962> according <WG2596> to the flesh, <WG4561> with fear <WG5401> and trembling, <WG5156> in singleness <WG572> of your <WG5216> heart, <WG2588> as to Christ; <WG5547>
Not with eye-service, <WG3787> as men pleasers; <WG441> but as the servants <WG1401> of Christ, <WG5547> doing <WG4160> the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316> from the heart; <WG5590>
With good <WG2133> will <WG2133> doing <WG1398> service, <WG1398> as to the Lord, <WG2962> and not to men: <WG444>

Knowing <WG1492> that whatever <WG3739> good <WG18> thing any <WG1538> man does, <WG4160> the same <WG3778> shall he receive <WG2865> of the Lord, <WG2962> whether <WG1535> he be bond <WG1401> or <WG1535> free. <WG1658>

And, you masters, <WG2962> do <WG4160> the same <WG846> things to them, forbearing <WG447> threatening: <WG547> knowing <WG1492> that your <WG5216> Master <WG2962> also <WG2532> is in heaven; <WG3772> neither <WG2532> <WG3756> is there respect <WG4382> of persons <WG4382> with him.
Finally, <WG3063> my brothers, <WG80> be strong <WG1743> in the Lord, <WG2962> and in the power <WG2904> of his might. <WG2479>
Put <WG1746> on <WG1746> the whole armor <WG3833> of God, <WG2316> that you may be able <WG1410> to stand <WG2476> against <WG4314> the wiles <WG3180> of the devil. <WG1228>

For we wrestle <WG2076> <WG3823> not against <WG4314> flesh <WG4561> and blood, <WG129> but against <WG4314> principalities, <WG746> against <WG4314> powers, <WG1849> against <WG4314> the rulers <WG2888> of the darkness <WG4655> of this <WG5127> world, <WG165> against <WG4314> spiritual <WG4152> wickedness <WG4189> in high <WG2032> places.

Why <WG1223> <WG5124> take <WG353> to you the whole armor <WG3833> of God, <WG2316> that you may be able <WG1410> to withstand <WG436> in the evil <WG4190> day, <WG2250> and having done <WG2716> all, <WG537> to stand. <WG2476>

Stand <WG2476> therefore, <WG3767> having your <WG5216> loins <WG3751> girt <WG4024> about <WG4024> with truth, <WG226> and having <WG1746> on <WG1746> the breastplate <WG2382> of righteousness; <WG1343>
And your <WG3588> feet <WG4228> shod <WG5265> with the preparation <WG2091> of the gospel <WG2098> of peace; <WG1515>

Above <WG1909> all, <WG3956> taking <WG353> the shield <WG2375> of faith, <WG4102> with which <WG1722> <WG3739> you shall be able <WG1410> to quench <WG4570> all <WG3956> the fiery <WG4448> darts <WG956> of the wicked. <WG4190>
And take <WG1209> the helmet <WG4030> of salvation, <WG4992> and the sword <WG3162> of the Spirit, <WG4151> which <WG3739> is the word <WG4487> of God: <WG2316>

Praying <WG4336> always <WG1722> with all <WG3956> prayer <WG4335> and supplication <WG1162> in the Spirit, <WG4151> and watching <WG69> thereunto <WG1519> with all <WG3956> perseverance <WG4343> and supplication <WG1162> for all <WG3956> saints; <WG40>

And for me, that utterance <WG3056> may be given <WG1325> to me, that I may open <WG1722> <WG457> my mouth <WG4750> boldly, <WG3954> to make <WG1107> known <WG1107> the mystery <WG3466> of the gospel, <WG2098>
For which <WG3739> I am an ambassador <WG4243> in bonds: <WG254> that therein <WG1722> <WG846> I may speak boldly, <WG3955> as I ought <WG1163> to speak. <WG2980>

But that you also <WG2532> may know <WG1492> my affairs, <WG2596> and how <WG5101> I do, <WG4238> Tychicus, <WG5190> a beloved <WG27> brother <WG80> and faithful <WG4103> minister <WG1249> in the Lord, <WG2962> shall make <WG1107> known <WG1107> to you all <WG3956> things:
Whom <WG3739> I have sent <WG3992> to you for the same <WG846> purpose, that you might know <WG1097> our affairs, <WG4012> and that he might comfort <WG3870> your <WG5216> hearts. <WG2588>
Peace <WG1515> be to the brothers, <WG80> and love <WG26> with faith, <WG4102> from God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
Grace <WG5485> be with all <WG3956> them that love <WG25> our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> in sincerity. <WG861> Amen. <WG281> To the Ephesians written from Rome, by Tychicus.
